expansionRatio2.title: expansionRatio
expansionRatio2.description: expansion factor for layer mesh, increase in size from one layer to the next.

finalLayerThickness2.title: finalLayerThickness
finalLayerThickness2.description: thickness of layer furthest from the wall, usually in combination with relative sizes according to the relativeSizes entry.

firstLayerThickness2.title: firstLayerThickness
firstLayerThickness2.description: thickness of layer nearest the wall, usually in combination with absolute sizes according to the relativeSizes entry.

thickness2.title: thickness
thickness2.description: total thickness of all layers of cells, usually in combination with absolute sizes according to the relativeSizes entry
